description.en: Flips everything to its exact opposite. Bright becomes dark, happy becomes sad, and all relationships reverse completely.
description.de: Kehrt alles ins genaue Gegenteil um. Hell wird dunkel, frÃ¶hlich wird traurig, und alle Beziehungen werden komplett umgedreht.
description.fr: Inverse tout en son exact opposÃ©. Le lumineux devient sombre, le joyeux devient triste, et toutes les relations s'inversent complÃ¨tement.
description.es: Invierte todo a su opuesto exacto. Lo brillante se vuelve oscuro, lo alegre se vuelve triste y todas las relaciones se invierten completamente.

context.en:
Describe the exact diametral opposite. Entities as well as relations have to be turned into their opposites.

Examples of inversions:
- Spatial: above â†” below, inside â†” outside, near â†” far, open â†” closed
- Visual: bright â†” dark, large â†” small, colorful â†” monochrome, sharp â†” blurred
- Emotional: joy â†” grief, calm â†” agitated, hope â†” despair, love â†” hate
- Social: friend â†” enemy, together â†” alone, harmony â†” conflict, trust â†” suspicion
- Temporal: fast â†” slow, new â†” old, beginning â†” end, growth â†” decay
- Material: hard â†” soft, hot â†” cold, heavy â†” light, rough â†” smooth

Invert BOTH entities AND their relationships. If 'A supports B', then 'A opposes B' in the opposite.

- Material: hart â†” weich, heiÃŸ â†” kalt, schwer â†” leicht, rau â†” glatt

Kehre SOWOHL EntitÃ¤ten ALS AUCH ihre Beziehungen um. Wenn 'A unterstÃ¼tzt B', dann 'A bekÃ¤mpft B' im Gegenteil.
